verses.name: Psalms 108:1
verses.text: O God, my heart is fixed; I will sing and give praise, even with my glory.

verses.name: Psalms 108:2
verses.text: Awake, psaltery and harp: I myself will awake early.

verses.name: Psalms 108:3
verses.text: I will praise thee, O Lord, among the people: and I will sing praises unto thee among the nations.

verses.name: Psalms 108:4
verses.text: For thy mercy is great above the heavens: and thy truth reacheth unto the clouds.

verses.name: Psalms 108:5
verses.text: Be thou exalted, O God, above the heavens: and thy glory above all the earth;

verses.name: Psalms 108:6
verses.text: That thy beloved may be delivered: save with thy right hand, and answer me.
